users.name: Sam Chen
users.bio: Passionate dancer exploring various styles from contemporary to hip-hop. Always excited to learn from amazing choreographers and connect with the dance community.

users.name: Alex Rivera
users.bio: Contemporary dance artist with 10+ years of experience in performance and teaching. Specializes in emotional storytelling through movement and creating safe spaces for artistic expression. Former company member of several contemporary dance companies.

users.name: Jordan Kim
users.bio: Hip-hop choreographer and cultural educator dedicated to preserving street dance authenticity while pushing creative boundaries. Trained in Los Angeles and New York, now sharing knowledge through workshops and battles.
